description.value: Existing mood tracking apps do a tad too much, often leaving you feeling overwhelming. So I started building Mudo, a micro-mood journal app that does what it says. No fancy features, just a simple way to log your mood and reflect. Powerful insights to help you understand your emotional patterns over time.

recommendations: Add an og/image in frontmatter for social previews
Add at least one internal link to other content
Add a canonical URL to frontmatter
